mapper.select: select * from product where title=#{title} and content=#{content}

select pro.id,pro.title,pro.thumb,pro.price,pro.disc,pro.ad,pro.discounted,pro.content,pro.categoryId,pro.bgImg,pro.sale,pro.newly,pro.best,ca.parentTypeId from product pro inner join category ca on ca.Id = pro.categoryId
